languages.text: "Я наняла ловчих, чтобы они изловили подходящего зверя в джунглях Януса. Это стоило в семь раз больше, чем она весит, но... Великий послал нам друзей не для того, чтобы мы скупились на чувства к ним, верно?"

"I hired hunters to catch me a suitable beast in the jungles of Janus. She cost me seven times what she weighs, but... the Exalted One does not send us friends so that we can be stingy with our affections, does He?"
languages.original_text: "Я наняла ловчих, чтобы они изловили подходящего зверя в джунглях Януса. Это стоило в семь раз больше, чем она весит, но... Великий послал нам друзей не для того, чтобы мы скупились на чувства к ним, верно?"

traits.locale_text: "I hired hunters to catch me a suitable beast in the jungles of Janus. She cost me seven times what she weighs, but... the Exalted One does not send us friends so that we can be stingy with our affections, does He?"

"I hired hunters to catch me a suitable beast in the jungles of Janus. She cost me seven times what she weighs, but... the Exalted One does not send us friends so that we can be stingy with our affections, does He?"

"I hired hunters to catch me a suitable beast in the jungles of Janus. She cost me seven times what she weighs, but... the Exalted One does not send us friends so that we can be stingy with our affections, does He?"

"I hired hunters to catch me a suitable beast in the jungles of Janus. She cost me seven times what she weighs, but... the Exalted One does not send us friends so that we can be stingy with our affections, does He?"

languages.text: “我雇了猎人，从加努斯丛林里抓来了这只异虎。她花了我正常七倍的价格，不过……至高无上的神皇将朋友送到我们身边，并不是为了让我们对朋友一毛不拔，没错吧？”
languages.original_text: "I hired hunters to catch me a suitable beast in the jungles of Janus. She cost me seven times what she weighs, but... the Exalted One does not send us friends so that we can be stingy with our affections, does He?"

traits.locale_text: “我雇了猎人，从加努斯丛林里抓来了这只异虎。她花了我正常七倍的价格，不过……至高无上的神皇将朋友送到我们身边，并不是为了让我们对朋友一毛不拔，没错吧？”

languages.text: 「ヤヌスのジャングルでちゃんとした獣を捕まえるためにハンターを雇ったんだ。彼女は体重の7倍くらいの金がかかってるんだけど…エグザルテッド・ワンはしみったれた愛情表現のために友を送り込んでくれたわけじゃないでしょ？」
languages.original_text: "I hired hunters to catch me a suitable beast in the jungles of Janus. She cost me seven times what she weighs, but... the Exalted One does not send us friends so that we can be stingy with our affections, does He?"

traits.locale_text: 「ヤヌスのジャングルでちゃんとした獣を捕まえるためにハンターを雇ったんだ。彼女は体重の7倍くらいの金がかかってるんだけど…エグザルテッド・ワンはしみったれた愛情表現のために友を送り込んでくれたわけじゃないでしょ？」

languages.text: «He contratado cazadores para que atraparan una bestia adecuada en las selvas de Janus. Me ha costado siete veces lo que pesa, pero... el Exaltado no nos da a las amistades para que escatimemos en muestras de afecto, ¿verdad?».
languages.original_text: "I hired hunters to catch me a suitable beast in the jungles of Janus. She cost me seven times what she weighs, but... the Exalted One does not send us friends so that we can be stingy with our affections, does He?"

traits.locale_text: «He contratado cazadores para que atraparan una bestia adecuada en las selvas de Janus. Me ha costado siete veces lo que pesa, pero... el Exaltado no nos da a las amistades para que escatimemos en muestras de afecto, ¿verdad?».

languages.text: « J'ai payé des chasseurs pour m'attraper l'animal parfait dans les jungles de Janus. Elle m'a coûté sept fois son poids, mais... si l'Exalté nous envoie des amis, ce n'est pas pour que nous limitions les marques de notre affection, n'est-ce pas ? »
languages.original_text: "I hired hunters to catch me a suitable beast in the jungles of Janus. She cost me seven times what she weighs, but... the Exalted One does not send us friends so that we can be stingy with our affections, does He?"

traits.locale_text: « J'ai payé des chasseurs pour m'attraper l'animal parfait dans les jungles de Janus. Elle m'a coûté sept fois son poids, mais... si l'Exalté nous envoie des amis, ce n'est pas pour que nous limitions les marques de notre affection, n'est-ce pas ? »

languages.text: "Ich engagierte Jäger, die mir in den Dschungeln auf Janus eine majestätische Bestie fangen sollten. Sie hat mich das Siebenfache ihres Gewichts gekostet, aber ... der Erhabene schenkt uns doch keine Freunde, damit wir dann mit unserer Zuneigung knausern, oder?"
languages.original_text: "I hired hunters to catch me a suitable beast in the jungles of Janus. She cost me seven times what she weighs, but... the Exalted One does not send us friends so that we can be stingy with our affections, does He?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich engagierte Jäger, die mir in den Dschungeln auf Janus eine majestätische Bestie fangen sollten. Sie hat mich das Siebenfache ihres Gewichts gekostet, aber ... der Erhabene schenkt uns doch keine Freunde, damit wir dann mit unserer Zuneigung knausern, oder?"

languages.text: "Birkaç avcı kiralayıp, bana Janus ormanlarından uygun bir hayvan yakalamalarını istedim. Ağırlığının yedi katına mâl oldu bana ama... Görkemli bize sevgimizi gösterirken cimrilik edelim diye arkadaşlar yollamıyor, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "I hired hunters to catch me a suitable beast in the jungles of Janus. She cost me seven times what she weighs, but... the Exalted One does not send us friends so that we can be stingy with our affections, does He?"

traits.locale_text: "Birkaç avcı kiralayıp, bana Janus ormanlarından uygun bir hayvan yakalamalarını istedim. Ağırlığının yedi katına mâl oldu bana ama... Görkemli bize sevgimizi gösterirken cimrilik edelim diye arkadaşlar yollamıyor, değil mi?"
